name: MagDef
description:
/!\ ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------/!\

As of Chrome 42 (Released April 14th), NPAPI plugins are disabled by default! That means Unity Player, Java, and Silverlight games will not work in the Chrome browser!

A workaround is to enable NPAPI plugins in your Chrome settings. Copy+Paste this URL in to a tab:

chrome://flags/#enable-npapi

/!\-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------/!\

Created for Ludum Dare 32 #LDJAM #ludum-dare-32

MagDef is a planet defense game. Use the arrow keys to rotate the magnetic field and repel the asteroids! Blue repels Red, Red repels Blue. The Boss asteroids can't be repelled by the fields, so you will have to be creative.

Research weapons so your population can help in the defense:
o Missiles
o Pulse
o Force Fields

Have fun, don't hesitate to comment with your feedback, scores and progression :)

Fix #1: unlocked all planets from the start and tweaked some tooltips
Fix #2: tweaked slow difficulty values
